entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a person mentioned in the text as having a mark on his arm. The text states that Voldemort pressed his fingers to Wormtail's mark, causing pain and a change in color.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person mentioned in the text as having red gleaming eyes. He is described as removing his fingers from Wormtail's mark and causing it to turn jet black.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person mentioned in the text as having a scar on his forehead. The text states that when Voldemort pressed his fingers to Wormtail's mark, Harry felt pain and saw the mark change color.

relationships.description: Voldemort causes Wormtail to feel pain when he presses his fingers to Wormtail's mark. This is described in the text as 'The scar on Harry's forehead seared with a sharp pain again'.
Voldemort causes Wormtail's mark to change color when he presses his fingers to it. This is described in the text as 'Harry saw that it had turned jet black'.
Voldemort causes Harry to feel pain when he presses his fingers to Wormtail's mark. This is described in the text as 'The scar on Harry's forehead seared with a sharp pain again'.
Voldemort causes Harry to feel emotional distress when he presses his fingers to Wormtail's mark. This is described in the text as 'Harry saw that it had turned jet black'.
